1430300.name: Too Much Water OST
1430300.description:
This is the soundtrack for Too Much Water. This features more than 10 original tracks composed specifically for the game. The soundtrack also includes tracks that never actually made it into the game (OOH~ Unused content? Yes, please!) A lot of time has gone into the production of the soundtrack, so give it a listen!

The soundtrack includes the following tracks so far:
  • 1 - Rafting Calmly
  • 2 - Social Interaction
  • 3 - Unidentified Encounter
  • 4 - Panic
  • 5 - You are a clown. A fool.
  • 6 - Blazing Seaweed
  • 7 - BrooM Ripoff
  • 8 - BrooM Ripoff (faster)
  • 9 - Boss Fight
  • 10 - The Finale
  • U1 - Panic (Old)
  • U2 - The Finale (Unused)
  • U3 - Title Screen (Unused)
  • U4 - Dialogue (Unused)
